column4: hey all, sorry to bother everyone, was wondering if someone could give me a hand with a folder mount issue; trying to mount a folder on a ntfs partition as a cdrom device and its not going so well
uh what do you mean mount as a cd device?

that sounds familiar, i think so... story goes i'm trying to get dvd::rip to work, and i have a folder on my win partition with all the dvd files, and would like to be able to mount the folder as the cdrom (like an iso in windows, sorta) so i can rip from it
